extensionDescription.message: Simple Lorem Ipsum Generator fills form fields by using context menu or a hotkey (Ctrl+Shift+V).

extensionHotkey.message: Inserts 'Lorem Ipsum' text into the current focused input element.

contextmenuInsertLoremIpsumSingleField.description: Name of the context menu entry for single field

contextmenuInsertLoremIpsumAllFields.message: Fill all fields of this form
contextmenuInsertLoremIpsumAllFields.description: Name of the context menu entry for all fields
